title: Infamous Desire
description: Shy and awkward hotel maid, Liz Turner, and her billionaire crown prince boyfriend, Alexander Vassar, have decided to fight back against everyone who thinks they shouldn't be together. But they face an uphill task.The world press has unceremoniously dubbed her 'Dizzy Lizzy'. The King, still weak from his heart attack, tells her that Alex sees her as a passing fad. Worse still, the beautiful Lady Tatiana - still officially engaged to the prince - seeks Liz out for a very private and secret arrangement. But Liz is not prepared for the sudden curveball that Alex throws her.INFAMOUS DESIRE is a 16,000-word erotic romance novelette.
author: Artemis Hunt
